\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{ambeth.log.file}
\label{configuration:AmbethLogFile}
\ClearAPI
The path to the file to which Ambeth should write the log statements. No default value, if not set \AMBETH{} will not log to file.\\
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.log.LogConfigurationConstants.LogFile}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{ambeth.log.file}}]
ambeth.log.file=
\end{lstlisting}
